content:
I'd be happy to help you keep track of your reading list.

First, congratulations on your book club meeting today! "The Immortal Life of Henrietta Lacks" is a fascinating book. I hope your discussion goes well.

Now, let's get your reading list organized. You can share the titles of the new books you've bought and the old favorites you want to re-read, and I'll help you create a list. You can also add any other books that come to mind.

To get started, I'll create a simple list for you. You can add to it as you think of more books. Here's a starting point:

**New Books:**

* (add titles here)

**Old Favorites to Re-read:**

* (add titles here)

**Other Books to Read:**

* (add titles here)

Just type away, and I'll help you keep your list organized!
